# About
Hostel Ledger is a free expense tracking and bill splitting application designed for students, roommates, and people living in shared accommodations. The app makes it easy to track shared expenses, split bills automatically, manage group payments, and settle debts with roommates. Perfect for hostels, apartments, flatmates, and any shared living situation.

# Key Features
- Track shared expenses with roommates
- Split bills automatically and fairly
- Manage group payments easily
- Settle debts and balances
- Real-time balance tracking
- Complete transaction history
- Support for multiple groups
- Secure cloud synchronization
- User-friendly interface
- Mobile-responsive design
- Free to use forever

# How It Works
1. Create an account (free)
2. Add your roommates/group members
3. Record shared expenses
4. App automatically calculates who owes what
5. Track balances in real-time
6. Settle debts when convenient
7. View complete transaction history

# Comparison
Unlike other expense apps, Hostel Ledger is specifically designed for shared living situations with a focus on simplicity and ease of use. No complex features, just straightforward expense tracking and bill splitting.
